name: Onboarding System 2
description: A software solution designed for multinational corporations to manage, guide, and evaluate employees across various offices worldwide.
description_2:
A software solution designed for multinational corporations to manage, guide, and evaluate employees across various offices worldwide. The system encompasses five main workflows: Director Country, Director Office, Manager, HR, and Employee.

- Director Country: This role involves managing projects, workflows, work scenarios, and planning at a national level. Directors at this level also oversee and monitor the projects, workflows, work scenarios, and plans of the Director Offices under their jurisdiction.

- Director Office: Directors at the office level manage the projects, workflows, work scenarios, and planning specific to their office. They also supervise and track the progress, workflows, work scenarios, and plans of the Managers under their supervision.

- Manager: Managers are responsible for managing projects, workflows, work scenarios, and planning for their respective teams. They also oversee and monitor the progress, workflows, work scenarios, and plans of the teams and employees under their authority.

- Employee: Employees perform various roles and hold different positions within the company, such as in Business, IT, Education, Marketing, and more. New employees receive supportive steps for setup and learning, making it easier for them to integrate into the company or project. These steps are scenarios created by their managers tailored to their specific roles and positions.

The software facilitates communication and task assignment, ensuring smooth and efficient operations. Additionally, it features robust reporting capabilities, providing weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual reports.
role_2:
My responsibility is to ensure the company's Integration systems meet user needs and expectations.

- Collect and analyze requirements from customers: Conduct meetings to understand project needs, goals and challenges.

- Design user experience: Create user flows and wireframes to ensure the system is easy to use and meets user needs.

- Create prototypes: Develop interactive prototypes to test and improve the user experience.

- Conduct testing: Open meetings to gather feedback and improve designs based on customer feedback.

- Map user journeys: Outline user journey maps to understand the overall user experience when interacting with the system.

- Design interfaces: Create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces based on developed wireframes and prototypes.

- Develop design library (Design Systems): Build and maintain a design library containing standard UI components to ensure consistency throughout the system. (Called the Design Systems in Figma)

- Collaborate with developers: Work closely with developers to ensure that the UI design is accurately implemented and functions as expected. Use libraries that are appropriate for the framework the developer has chosen.

- Update and refine: Continuously update and refine the interface based on user feedback and testing results.

name: Line View GMI Web & App
description: A comprehensive project including website and mobile application. It is designed to manage large-scale data related to questions and answer choices.
description_2:
Line View GMI is a comprehensive project that includes both a website and a mobile application. It is designed to manage large-scale data related to questions and answer choices. The system supports various functionalities for different user roles, ensuring efficient data handling and user interaction. This project can be applied to multiple scenarios, such as competitions, surveys, market research, academic research, customer feedback collection, and any other activities involving questions and data analysis.

- Competitions: Facilitate the management and evaluation of large-scale competitions, including quizzes, talent shows, and academic contests.

- Surveys: Conduct and analyze surveys for market research, customer satisfaction, employee engagement, and more.

- Academic Research: Support researchers in collecting, managing, and analyzing data from academic studies and experiments.

- Customer Feedback: Gather and analyze feedback from customers to improve products, services, and overall customer experience.

- Internal Assessments: Assist organizations in conducting internal assessments and performance reviews for employees

Data Processing Objectives : 

- Data Collection: Efficiently gather large volumes of data from various sources.

- Data Management: Organize and store data securely and accessibly.

- Data Analysis: Analyze data to generate insights, trends, and reports.

- Data Visualization: Present data in a visually appealing and easy-to-understand manner.

- Reporting: Generate comprehensive reports for different stakeholders, including weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual reports.

name: Appsure
description: Appsure insurance management application is a powerful, flexible and user-friendly system that helps insurance companies optimize their processes, enhance customer experience and manage data effectively.
description_2:
Appsure is a powerful, flexible, and user-friendly insurance management application developed for Appsure, an Australian company. The application helps insurance companies optimize their processes, enhance customer experience, and manage data effectively. This comprehensive system supports various functionalities for different user roles, ensuring efficient operation and interaction across the insurance workflow.

Applications of the Project:

- Policy Management: Streamline the creation, updating, and management of insurance policies.

- Claims Processing: Automate and manage the submission, review, and approval of insurance claims.

- Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Enhance customer interactions and maintain detailed customer records.

- Billing and Invoicing: Simplify billing processes and manage invoices for insurance policies.

- Risk Management: Assess and manage risks associated with insurance policies.

- Regulatory Compliance: Ensure compliance with industry regulations and standards.

- Analytics and Reporting: Provide insights and detailed reports on various aspects of the insurance business.

- …

Target Audience:

- Insurance Companies: Firms looking to optimize their operations, improve customer experience, and manage data efficiently.

- Insurance Brokers: Brokers who need to manage multiple policies, clients, and claims.

- Insurance Agents: Agents who require tools to manage client interactions, policy details, and claim submissions.

- Customers: Individuals and businesses purchasing and managing their insurance policies.

- …

Data Processing Objectives:

- Data Collection: Gather data from various sources, including policy applications, claims submissions, and customer interactions.

- Data Management: Organize, store, and retrieve data securely and efficiently.

- Data Analysis: Analyze data to identify trends, assess risks, and make informed decisions.

- Data Visualization: Present data in a visually appealing and easy-to-understand manner.

- Reporting: Generate comprehensive reports for stakeholders, including weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual reports.
